pkgmetadata.longdescription: # How to installDownload the code```git clone https://github.com/PanDAWMS/panda-client.gitcd panda-client```and install it```python setup.py install --prefix=/path/to/install/dir```or create the tar ball```python setup.py sdistpip install dist/panda-client-*.tar.gz```# How to use```source /path/to/install/dir/etc/panda/panda_setup.[c]shprun -hpathena -h```# Release NotesSee ChangeLog.txt# CVMFS deployment1. Leave the tar ball under: /afs/cern.ch/user/a/atlpan/www/panda-client. The web https://atlpan.web.cern.ch/atlpan/panda-client/ publishes the afs directory.1. Update the release notes: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/PanDA/PandaTools1. Request atlas-adc-tier3sw-install to copy on CVMFS # Uploading to pip```python setup.py sdist upload```Uploading source so that wheel generates setup files locally. # AcknowledgeIcons from http://iconka.com
